name: BingoBangoBonGolf
description:
In the future when golf courses have become abandoned due to severe climate change, a new sport emerges. Drive your all electric vehicle at the giant ball and get it in the goal! Strive to get the ball in the goal with the least number of hits and shortest time. Do you have what it takes?! Earth depends on you!

w - Drive Forward
s - Drive Backward
a -Turn/Rotate Counter Clockwise
d -Turn/Rotate Clockwise
esc - exit
r - restart level

Music:
"Neon Laser Horizon" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Art:
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/racing-pack

Framework:
https://love2d.org/

Made for BingoJam!
https://itch.io/jam/bingo-jam

Works on windows, but probably/might work on Linux or Mac but I don't have those machines, so... Hope it works! :D

Bingo Points - 

  1. Game name is a pun, alliteration, wordplay, or includes the theme or jam name
  2. Provide extensive lore/backstory on the itch page
  3. Do not include a main menu
  4. Use Kevin McLeod music (be sure to give credit, as specified on the website)
  5. Use Kenney assets
  6. Use the default Unity skybox somehow
  7. Font is Comic Sans (free lookalike), and/or Arial (Unity default), other meme-y fonts will be accepted.
  8. Include a box/rock pushing puzzle
  9. Post WIP images/gifs in the Discord
  10. Give the exe/zip and the game different names
  11. Esc button quits the game 
  12. Post the final game submission in the Discord
  13. Include a sweet gameplay gif on the itch page
  14. Upload an untested build for a system mentioning that you don't have access to it (i.e. Mac users post a PC build, and vice versa)
  15. Submit the game within 1 hour or less of the deadline
  16. Free Space

Total = 16 (I'm mad I didn't include a kitty :( )
